typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> mapsys

source(output(
		LCALCAID as string,

		LCACLMN3 as decimal(38,18),
		LCACLMDATE as timestamp,

		LCAACSTAT as string,
		LCALOSSCO as string,
		LCAOUTSTM as string,
		LCAUWSIGN as string,
		LCAOFFICE as decimal(38,18),

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> lcatable
mapsys derive(CODE_TYPE_ID = toString(toInteger(CODE_TYPE_ID))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		code_type_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		source_code_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		code_type_id = CODE_TYPE_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
lcatable sink(input(
		lcauwsign as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		lcauwsign = LCAUWSIGN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
sigtable sink(input(
		sigsign as string,
		sigoffice as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		sigsign = SIGSIGN,
		sigoffice = SIGOFFICE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
